task.title: Accessing Your Inbox
task.shortdesc: This section will detail how to access the inbox, a main feature of Monday.com. Here users can see notifications, updates, and messages from coworkers. They can quickly view the information without having to go into individual projects.

step.cmd: The Inbox is automatically shown on the homepage of Monday.com
If not located, click on the Monday logo in the top left to bring you back home, the inbox will now be available.
